LOGIN_CARD.HEADLINE: Personal Dashboard
LOGIN_CARD.PGPH1: The Personal Dashboard is only accessible for registered customers.
LOGIN_CARD.PGPH2: Please log in or register to access your personal dashboard with exclusive insights and exciting features guiding you to your new Mercedes-Benz.

REGISTRATION_CARD.HEADLINE: Personal Dashboard - No registration yet
REGISTRATION_CARD.PGPH1: Interested in receiving news on our upcoming Mercedes-Benz cars? Then register here and benefit from exclusive updates.
REGISTRATION_CARD.PGPH2: Choose your model and start the corresponding registration process
REGISTRATION_CARD.LABEL: Mercedes-Benz {{model}}

ERROR.HEADLINE: We're sorry, something went wrong.
ERROR.PGPH1: Unfortunately something went wrong. Please try again later.

ACTIVITY.HEADLINE: Start your journey towards the {{model}}
ACTIVITY.TEXT: Click below to find out more.

OPEN.HEADLINE: Next Steps
OPEN.TEXT: Check back for {{model}} news and even more features.

POST.HEADLINE: Retailer Locator
POST.TEXT: The details of your preferred Mercedes-Benz EQ Retailer can be found below:
POST.EMAIL_SUBJECT: Please contact me with further information about EQC

POST.QUESTION: When will you be looking for your new EQC?

POST.HEADLINE: Configuration Online Code:
POST.TEXT: Thank you for configuring your ideal EQC. Your Online Code that relate to your current configuration {{onlineCode}}. This code remains active for 30 days after the last change.

INTERESTED.TEXT1: Thank you for your interest in booking a Test Drive with the first all-electric Mercedes-Benz, the EQC. Please give us a moment to process your request.
INTERESTED.TEXT2: Your Test Drive confirmation will be ready soon. We hope you are just as excited as we are.

BOOKED.TEXT1: The EQC. Electric tested on ice. Electric tested in the desert. Now it is your turn.
BOOKED.TEXT2: In {{days}} days the EQC will be ready for you.

FINISHED.TEXT1: We hope the Mercedes Benz EQC has also passed its test and exceeded your expectations.

LOCATOR.HEADLINE: Preferred Mercedes-Benz EQ Passenger Car Partner
LOCATOR.SUBHEADLINE: Based on your address details during registration we have found the following Mercedes-Benz EQ Passenger Car Partner. Please select your preferred dealer from this list, or amend the search in order to search for further Mercedes-Benz EQ Passenger Car Partner.
LOCATOR.ERROR: Please select your preferred dealer form the list.

VALIDATION.MESSAGE: Please enter a valid postcode or city.

LOCATOR.FOOTNOTE: *Please note that only authorised Mercedes-Benz EQ Passenger Car Partners are displayed in this list.

USAGE.HEADLINE: Usage of vehicle
USAGE.PARAGRAPH: We would love to know how you intend to use the Mercedes-Benz EQC, so that we can provide you with optimum support in a potential future purchase.

BUSINESS.LABEL: Business vehicle*
BUSINESS.ERROR: The company name can't be empty or have the following characters: '<>;!'

USAGE.ERROR: Please choose the purpose of the Mercedes-Benz EQC.

DECLARATION.HEADLINE: Declaration of consent
DECLARATION.PGPH1: Mercedes-Benz Cars Middle East FZE take your privacy seriously. We will only use your personal information to provide the products and services you have requested from us or to administer your account. We may need to share your details with third parties in order to provide our services to you. Our full Privacy Policy is published on our website here and is also available on request.

SIGNATURE.LABEL: I confirm that I have read and I accept the declaration of consent.
SIGNATURE.ERROR: Please confirm that you have read and accept the declaration of consent.
